block.p: Saints and Colts Move On The New Orleans Saints will play for their first N.F.C. title after defeating the Philadelphia Eagles. The Indianapolis Colts advanced to the A.F.C. title game by beating the Baltimore Ravens.
Elation at Recovery of 2 Boys Two kidnapped boys, one missing for more than four years, smiled but did not speak at news conferences with their parents a day after they were found near St. Louis.

Coal's Dominion ''This Land,'' a column by Dan Barry, begins today, taking readers behind news articles and into obscure and well-known corners of the United States. Today: surviving the coal dust of West Virginia with miners like Chuck Gunnoe.
Faces Behind the Donations For every person helped by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, there is someone else who helped through a donation.
